name: africaundata
description: Data catalog for Africa provided by the United Nations Economic Commission for Africa (ECA). Includes a wide range of socio-economic indicators such as Population, Education, Health, National Accounts, Agriculture, Mining, Energy, Environment, Tourism, Trade, and Millennium Development Goals indicators.
owner_name: United Nations Economic Commission for Africa
owner_country: Ethiopia (ECA HQ location, for context, since owner is International)
